items.title: Resolved Juejin and X Publishing Issues in Publisher ðŸš€
items.summary: This update addresses critical issues with the Juejin and X publishing functionalities. Key modifications include enhancements to input handling in Playwright, improved focus management in the base publisher, and significant updates to the Juejin and X publisher classes for better content submission. These changes aim to streamline the publishing process and enhance user experience.

items.title: Enhance Image Upload Functionality in Platform Service ðŸš€
items.summary: This update introduces a new smart upload feature that automatically determines whether to handle images as Base64 or URLs, streamlining the upload process. Key modifications include enhancements to the core and utility files, improving the handling of image URLs and ensuring they are processed correctly before being sent to the CDN. These changes aim to enhance the overall efficiency and reliability of image uploads.
